item.title: Shortcode to Insert Raw HTML in Hugo
item.description: Hugo is very good framework of creating a website by using markdown. But there are times when Markdown falls short. Often, content authors are forced to add raw HTML (e.g., video ) to Markdown content. But Hugo does not seem to have a good way to let you do this in a markdown file. They created shortcodes to circumvent these limitations. A shortcode is a simple snippet inside a content file that Hugo will render using a predefined template.
